mapper.insert: insert into `receiptbill` (client_id, receiptTime, receiptMoney, course_id, payment_id, billNum, grade_id, remark, receipter_id, marketer_id, classTrend_id, totalMoney,state) values (#{client.id}, #{receipttime}, #{receiptmoney}, #{course.id}, #{payment.id}, #{billnum}, #{grade.id}, #{remark}, #{receipter.id}, #{marketer.id}, #{classtrend.id}, #{totalmoney},#{state})
mapper.update: update `receiptbill` set client_id = #{client.id}, receiptTime = #{receipttime}, receiptMoney = #{receiptmoney}, course_id = #{course.id}, payment_id = #{payment.id}, billNum = #{billnum}, grade_id = #{grade.id}, remark = #{remark}, receipter_id = #{receipter.id}, marketer_id = #{marketer.id}, classTrend_id = #{classtrend.id}, totalMoney = #{totalmoney} state = #{state} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, client_id, receiptTime, receiptMoney, course_id, payment_id, billNum, grade_id, remark, receipter_id, marketer_id, classTrend_id, totalMoney from `receiptbill` where id = #{id}
select id, client_id, receiptTime, receiptMoney, course_id, payment_id, billNum, grade_id, remark, receipter_id, marketer_id, classTrend_id, totalMoney,state from `receiptbill`

select re.id, re.receiptTime, re.receiptMoney, re.course_id, re.billNum, re.grade_id, re.remark, re.classTrend_id, re.totalMoney,re.state, c.id c_id, c.name c_name, pay.id pay_id, pay.payname pay_payname, receipter.id receipter_id, receipter.realname receipter_realname, marketer.id marketer_id, marketer.realname marketer_realname from `receiptbill` re left join client c on re.client_id = c.id left join payment pay on re.payment_id = pay.id left join employee receipter on re.receipter_id = receipter.id left join employee marketer on re.marketer_id = marketer.id
limit #{startIndex},#{rows}
